plot: A boy puts aside his video game to venture into the forest, where his imagination comes to life. When the dream becomes a nightmare, the boy confronts his greatest fear and comes to terms with what it means to be brave.
title: The Knightswood
plot_es: A boy puts aside his video game to venture into the forest, where his imagination comes to life. When the dream becomes a nightmare, the boy confronts his greatest fear and comes to terms with what it means to be brave.
